title: BRIEF-Oceanagold Says Philippines Court Of Appeals Set 18 Sept As Hearing Date For Injunction
text:
BRIEF-Oceanagold Says Philippines Court Of Appeals Set 18 Sept As Hearing Date For Injunction

Commodities 29 minutes ago (Sep 13, 2019 18:50)

BRIEF-Oceanagold Says Philippines Court Of Appeals Set 18 Sept As Hearing Date For Injunction Sept 13 (Reuters) - OceanaGold Corp : * PHILIPPINES COURT OF APPEALS IN MANILA SET 18 SEPT AS HEARING DATE FOR INJUNCTION * ON DIDIPIO OPERATION, PROCESSING PLANT IS EXPECTED TO RESUME OPERATIONS ON SEPT 24 * HEARING DATE REGARDING CO'S APPLICATION FOR INJUNCTION AS PART OF ITS APPEAL AGAINST NUEVA VIZCAYA PROVINCIAL COURT RULING

BRIEF-Oceanagold Says Philippines Court Of Appeals Set 18 Sept As Hearing Date For Injunction
description: BRIEF-Oceanagold Says Philippines Court Of Appeals Set 18 Sept As Hearing Date For Injunction
